title: Mundane Astrology
author: Baigent, Campion, and Harvey
summary: This is a classic work on astrology, providing in-depth analysis of core concepts and methodologies.

context.title: 1. Context & Background
context.position_and_influence: "Mundane Astrology" holds an important position in the field of astrology and is considered a classic work.
context.author_background: Baigent, Campion, and Harvey is a senior expert in the field of astrology with extensive academic background and practical experience.
context.core_contribution: This book addresses core pain points in astrology learning, providing a systematic learning framework and practical methods.

philosophy.title: 2. Core Philosophy and Theoretical Foundation
philosophy.underlying_logic: The core philosophy of this book is based on a holographic worldview, viewing the birth chart as a map of individual life.
philosophy.core_concepts: The book elaborates in detail on the definitions and interrelationships of core concepts such as planets, houses, and aspects.
philosophy.metaphor: The birth chart is like a navigation system for life, guiding us to understand our potentials and challenges.

structure.title: 3. Structural Deep Reading
structure.logic_flow: The book is organized according to the logic from theory to practice, helping readers build systematic understanding.

modules.name: Theoretical Foundation
modules.content: Introduction to basic principles and philosophical foundations of astrology

modules.name: Core Concepts
modules.content: In-depth analysis of planets, houses, and aspects

modules.name: Practical Application
modules.content: Providing specific chart reading methods and steps

key_chapters.insight: Revealing the deeper meanings of planets in the birth chart
Explaining the correspondence between houses and life areas

structure.knowledge_map: The knowledge system uses planets as points, houses as areas, and aspects as lines to construct a complete chart reading framework.

methodology.title: 4. Methodology and Practical Tools
methodology.core_methodology: This book provides a systematic chart reading methodology, including the complete process of information gathering, analysis, and integration.
steps: Gather basic information: birth date, time, and place
Draw the chart: use professional software or draw by hand
Analyze main features: identify planetary distribution and aspect patterns
Integrate interpretation: combine elements to form a complete picture
methodology.practical_tools: Provides practical tools such as chart templates, analysis checklists, and keyword cards.
methodology.common_issues: Common beginner issues include over-simplifying analysis, neglecting aspect details, and lacking a holistic view.

quotes.title: 5. Classic Quotes and Deep Interpretation

golden_quotes.quote: The birth chart is not a verdict of fate, but a map of self-knowledge.
golden_quotes.interpretation: This quote emphasizes that the essence of astrology is a tool for self-exploration, not a prophecy of destiny.

golden_quotes.quote: Every aspect is an opportunity for inner dialogue.
golden_quotes.interpretation: Reminds us that difficult aspects are not curses but opportunities for growth.

quotes.core_thought: The core value of astrology is to help people understand themselves and life lessons.

criticism.title: 6. Critical Analysis and Limitations
criticism.limitations: Some content may be limited by the knowledge framework of the publication era and needs to be understood in conjunction with the latest research.
criticism.controversies: There is controversy in academia about the scientific nature of astrology, but practitioners generally recognize its psychological insight value.
criticism.reading_pitfalls: Beginners are prone to mechanical interpretation, oversimplification, or mystification tendencies.
criticism.comparison: Compared to other similar books, this book places more emphasis on the combination of theory and practice.

action.title: 7. Reader Action Plan

learning_plan.task: Build framework: read through the book and create mind maps
Deep dive: intensively read core chapters and take detailed notes
Practice verification: apply methods to actual cases

action.immediate_action: Immediate action: Choose a familiar birth chart and practice analysis using methods from this book.
action.resources: It is recommended to learn with professional astrology software and join learning communities for exchange.
